caption.p: Anti-proliferative effects of methanol extract of A. austro-iranicum (a), A. serotinum (b) and A. chlorostegium (c) on various tumor cells (MCF-7, HT29, NCCIT, SH-SY5Y and A549) and one normal (HUVEC) cell line. Cells were treated with various concentrations of the extracts (10, 20, 40, 80, 160, 320, 640, and 1280 µg/ml) for 48 hr and subjected to MTT assay. IC 50 values are expressed as mean±SD of three independent experiments
